test_name: Valid Case 2 - Lost cat with complete info
description: Complete report of a lost cat

user_input.description: Our cat Luna has been missing for 2 days. She's a beautiful gray and white Persian mix with the most stunning green eyes. She has distinctive white paws and a very fluffy tail. Luna is shy around strangers but very affectionate with family. She's about 2 years old. Last seen in our neighborhood in San Vicente, Moravia, near the local church.

location.additional_details: Residential area, two blocks from the church

expected_matches.reason: Exact match - same cat, same owner reporting again
Recent sighting matching description in same area

notes: Should match LOST-002 perfectly and find SIGHT-002 as a promising lead.
